title: 1970–71 Isthmian League
text:
The 1970–71 season was the 56th in the history of the <a href="Isthmian%20League">Isthmian League</a>, an English <a href="Association%20football">football</a> competition.
<a href="Wycombe%20Wanderers%20F.C.">Wycombe Wanderers</a> were champions, winning their third Isthmian League title. At the end of the season <a href="Maidstone%20United%20F.C.%20%281897%29">Maidstone United</a> and <a href="Wealdstone%20F.C.">Wealdstone</a> switched to the <a href="Southern%20Football%20League">Southern Football League</a>.
League table.
